job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtA Software Development company is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their team on a fulltime Direct Hire basis Youd be joining a team of unique problem solvers with a multitude of skills and perspectives Youll be responsible for taking the lead on relevant projects while surrounded by people who will provide support and mentorshipltbrgtltbrgtAs a Site Reliability Engineer youll mainly be focused on running better production application and systems creating a strict engineering discipline and utilizing software and systems to help find creative engineering solutions to operational problemsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequired Skills ampamp ExperienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtAzure and AWSltligtltligtAzure DevOpsltligtltligtScripting in either Java or PowershellltligtltligtTerraform and ansibleltligtltligtKubernetesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtDesired Skills ampamp Experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt5 years of experience in an DevOps EnvironmentltligtltligtOracleltligtltligtSpringbootltligtltligtDockerltbrgtltligtltulgtltugtThe OfferltbrgtltugtltulgtltligtCompetitive Salary Up to 155Kyear DOEltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtYou Will Receive The Following Benefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligthealth dental visionltligtltligt401kltligtltligtCasual and Flexible Work Culture and EnvironmentltligtltligtAbility to work in a Techdriven companyltbrgtltligtltulgtApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basis now and in the futureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtPosted Byltstronggt Connor Bowlesltbrgtltbrgt
